entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
